title: Descent 3
description:
Full version of Descent 3 for the PC. Upgrade and no-CD patcher included in first ISO. Does NOT include Mercenary expansion pack.


Game info: <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Descent_3" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Descent_3</a>


A very under-appreciated title and very advanced for its time. If you like it you can pick up a real copy (WITH the mercenary expansion pack!) for like $5 online.


From Instructions.txt:
----------------------
1) Mount or burn ISO for disc 1 (Burn Disc 2 also, if you&#039;re doing that...)

2) Install (Do a "full" install if you aren&#039;t burning the discs). Remount/swap discs if the setup asks. DO NOT install into a "deep" directory. Ideally it should be installed fairly close to the drive root (c:descent3). The game apparently has issues with long path names and will crash.

3) Apply Update on Disc 1 (update/ folder - copy the EXE to game&#039;s directory first!)

4) Apply NoCD crack on disc 1 (nocd/ folder - copy the EXE to game&#039;s directory first!)

5) Launch from a command prompt as:

> main.exe -launched  United States

...and bypass the stupid registration nag and setup/launcher utility or just use the included play.bat file.
